summary: This is an internal FBI email from July 2, 2019, forwarding a message about the indictment and arrest warrant for Jeffrey Epstein. It details immediate operational plans for his arrest upon return to the U.S., execution of a search warrant at his NYC residence, and deployment of agents to Florida to serve subpoenas and interview individuals.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the indictment and arrest warrant; believed to be in France at the time of the email.

events.title: Epstein Indicted in SDNY
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was indicted in the Southern District of New York, and a warrant for his arrest was sworn out.

events.title: Planned Arrest and Search
events.description: FBI plans to arrest Epstein upon his return to the U.S., execute a search warrant at his NYC residence, and interview co-conspirators.

events.title: Deployment to Florida
events.description: Two FBI agents are to be deployed to Florida to serve subpoenas and attempt to interview 1-3 individuals.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was indicted in the Southern District of New York on July 2, 2019, and an arrest warrant was issued.
At the time of the email, Epstein was believed to be in France, and the FBI planned to arrest him immediately upon his return to the United States.
The FBI planned to execute a search warrant at Epstein's residence in New York City and interview co-conspirators.
Two FBI agents were to be deployed to Florida to serve subpoenas and interview 1-3 individuals as part of the investigation.
The operational planning was urgent, with the FBI on standby as Epstein's return to the U.S. was uncertain and could happen at any time.
